body.name: Paula's Choice Water-Infusing Electrolyte Face Moisturizer, Lightweight Deep Hydration for All Skin Types Including Dry and Acne-Prone Skin, 1.7 Ounces
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 4 hrs 34 mins
features: RESTORE VITAL HYDRATION: Electrolytes replenish dry skin's water content both above and below skin's surface for lasting, weightless, non-greasy hydration.
STRENGTHEN MOISTURE BARRIER: Enhanced mineral electrolytes calcium, potassium & magnesium train skin to maintain its moisture balance creating a healthier, instantly plumper, dewy feel.

Whipped lotion texture works well as a daily facial moisturizer for all skin types including dry, oily and breakout-prone skin. Antioxidants, ceramides, B vitamins and prebiotic sugars work to optimize hydration in skin's uppermost layer.

Paula's Choice products are made with YOUR SKIN in mind. Whether your skin is dry, oily, combination, aging, acne or blemish-prone, sensitive, or dull; we've got a skincare solution for you. The search for amazing skincare ends here. Finally, you found it
Paula's Choice Skincare makes products that work. No fragrance, no parabens, no fluff. Just effective, science-backed formulas that target any concern from wrinkles to breakouts.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #42,188 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #1,002 in Face Moisturizers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I am 32 combo oily/dry skin. Dry skin & large pores around the cheek area and this product is very smooth & hydrating & doesn't weigh down my large pores like other products do. It does leave my skin looking rejuvenated and soft like the hydration is coming from within the skin, not a layer of moisturizer. I've also tried the Paula's Choice Omega+ Complex Lightweight Face Moisturizer but that one is not as lightweight and it has a thicker consistency, where as this one feels a lot more smoother and watery, better suited for my skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've become a huge fan of Paula's choice over the last 6 months. This is my first time using this product. I was nervous to ever apply moisturizer before bed for fear of waking up greasy and broken out. This moisturizer is perfect, I look refreshed and plump every morning I use this the night before as my last product of my regime. ( Sensitive skin)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this stuff!
reviews.reviewText: A little about my skin type... sensitive and breakout prone when it comes to using moisturizers, hair products, and any type of body lotions that somehow make its way to my face. I actually tried this a year ago when my face was dehydrated and breaking out in the winter. When I first put it on my face it was like instant relief ... and I have been using it since. I use it more sparingly in the summer and mix it with a vitamin c sunscreen and a bb cream but this time of year I use it with full force. I only wish they made one for the body (in winter months Cerave SA is my go to but I have to make sure it doesn't get on my face).The only negative thing is the amount you get for the price. I would love a bigger bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2020
reviews.reviewText: This is an effective moisturizer that doesn't leave my face feeling greasy. It is easy to apply, and I don't notice a scent, which I love. This is too expensive. It is a nice moisturizer, but not nice enough to be the price that it is. It works well under my foundation, or by itself as I am heading to bed at night. I like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow. Very very hydrating!
reviews.reviewText: I have very dry skin and have been disappointed in several of Paula's Choice moisturizers. I was wary of this because it is for "all skin types," a designation that usually makes me mad. No moisturizer is right for all skin types. BUT I use this as a hydrator before my facial oil and/or good moisturizer which currently is Drunk Elephant La La Retro.And it's fabulous! I have skin that feels tight and painful when dehydrated and boy, this does the trick! This is now a must-have for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2022
reviews.reviewText: It is a non oily moisturizer that really has water. It will work very well in hot weather, I will not recommend it in winter. It is very good for oily skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It smells like medicine and I don’t love the texture of it. I guess it works and the smell goes away after a few minutes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love Paula's Choice and This is No Exception
reviews.reviewText: Skin care reviews are tricky because everyone has their own likes/dislikes. But for me, this is a 5 star moisturizer. I have used PC for years. Most products I like. Some I don't care for. This one I love and would definitely buy again. Great consistency, texture, no fragrance, great packaging, squeezes out of tube in perfect amount. There is nothing I don't like about this product. Thanks again Paula!
